mapper.delete: UPDATE user set deleted_at = now() WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted_at IS NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (email, password, name, gender) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{gender});
mapper.select: SELECT id, email, name, gender, phone_number, address, is_active, birthdate, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at FROM user WHERE name = #{name} AND birthdate = #{birthDate};
SELECT id, email, name, gender, phone_number, address, is_active, birthdate, created_at, updated_at FROM user WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted_at IS NULL;
SELECT id, email, name, gender, phone_number, address, is_active, birthdate, created_at, updated_at FROM user WHERE email = #{email} AND deleted_at IS NULL;
SELECT id, email, name, gender, phone_number, address, is_active, birthdate, created_at, updated_at FROM user WHERE phone_number = #{phoneNumber} AND deleted_at IS NULL;
